title: Page 2 – The Automatic Earth
cleaned_text:
'£120,000 isn't enough to compensate Gareth or their young child for the loss of a wife and mother.' Toby Young criticises the Government enrolling of AstraZeneca Covid vaccines, as a widower takes the company to court over his wife's vaccine complications. pic.twitter.com/GqrqLO4d0B

Horowitz: Switzerland suspends COVID shot campaign while US continues to promote shots for all “As the U.S. continues to recommend booster doses for infants and track those who refuse to get the shots, Switzerland’s Federal Office of Public Health now says that “no COVID-19 vaccination is recommended for spring/summer 2023.”

Cancer and heart disease vaccines ‘ready by end of the decade’

 “Exclusive: Pharmaceutical firm says groundbreaking jabs could save millions of lives” “A leading pharmaceutical firm said it is confident that jabs for cancer, cardiovascular and autoimmune diseases, and other conditions will be ready by 2030.” Just in time to treat all the cancer, cardiovascular and autoimmune diseases caused by the death vaxx – at least, for those still alive.

1. “Is the problem with mRNA delivery platform?” – Yes – the lipid nano particles containing the mRNA distribute throughout the body. They do NOT, as we were told, remain in the locus of the injection. In fact, Japanese bio-distribution data informs us that the LNPs concentrate in the ovaries, testes, spleen and liver. There are other serious issues with the LNP too:

 https://jessicar.substack.com/p/are-the-manufacturers-using-ionizable

 https://jessicar.substack.com/p/the-sm-102-cationic-lipid-and-alc 2. “Or the spike protein?” – Yes. Pathogenic period. All bad. In addition, the mRNA in the death vaxx is NOT like natural mRNA – the natural Uridine has been replaced by methylated psuedo-uridine. Completely unnatural and results in the mRNA in the death shot being resilient to normal breakdown mechanisms. ie. It stays around for much longer than would normally be the case.

 https://pubmed.ncbi.nlm.nih.gov/32090264/

 https://pubmed.ncbi.nlm.nih.gov/34805188/

 All bad. In addition, the mRNA has been optimised. All bad.

 https://pubmed.ncbi.nlm.nih.gov/34794169/ There’s so much more – but it’s Friday night, my US in-laws are visiting (he’s vaxx injured) and it’s time for pizza and a movie chez moi (“Mash” 1970)

Covid vaccine to be offered to vulnerable babies and children in UK “Christina Pagel, a professor of operational research at University College London and a member of the Independent Sage group, welcomed the decision but said it should cover the whole age group and not just those with other health conditions.” “The paediatric vaccines work very well to protect against severe outcomes, and they have been shown to be very safe. I think we should offer all parents the choice to protect their infants, toddlers and young children through vaccination before their first Covid infection.”
